name: google-news
description: JavaScript API for querying Google News

scripts.test: mocha test && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/codecov.io/bin/codecov.io.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Peter Andreas Moelgaard <admin@petermolgard.com> (http://petermolgaard.com/)
